item.title: Antlers Ending Explained: Mythology, Twist & Sequel Setup
item.description: Antlers is the latest horror film to unnerve with its creature mythology. We break down the ending, the lore, and the twist that sets up a sequel.

item.title: Clint Eastwood Only Starred In This 1993 Thriller He Also Directed Because Kevin Costner Rewrote The Script
item.description: Clint Eastwood and Kevin Costner only co-starred in one film together, and it wouldn't have happened if Costner hadn't changed the entire script.

item.title: Julian Sands' 10 Best Movies Ranked
item.description: The late Julian Sands was a consummate film actor who could fit well in schlocky horror movies as well as he could in Oscar-winning romantic dramas.
